Posts.Content: I am confused, are you sure you aren't thinking about long term disability or is there a tie between firefighting and colon cancer?
Posts.Signature: Spouse/Caregiver of 56 yr old male Diagnosed Primary CNS Lymphoma 2/2011 HDMTX Chemo- 8 cycles HDMTX Maintenance Chemo- 11 cycles Complications: clots, kidney issues, slow clearance of chemo, dermatitis 11/2013 Recurring clots in lungs/legs Scan 12-27-13 all clear Scan 3-13 all clear Next scan in October, done and all clear! Went early for scanxiety in Aug 2014, all clear! Scan Feb 2015, all clear!
Posts.Title: Letter from doctor

Posts.Content: I am assuming that they checked elsewhere for clots?? We just did the clot thing again and they said that if they did not find clots in the legs that they would be checking for prostate cancer that it is a source of clots. Luckily or they found them in the legs too. Back on blood thinners!

Posts.Title: Blood clots in each of my lungs doctor says they suspect prostate cancer
